languages.text: "Нам нужно знать, где находится этот когитатор! Пускай разговоры еретиков и не важны — я должен знать, почему машина была для них так ценна!"

traits.locale_text: "Нам нужно знать, где находится этот когитатор! Пускай разговоры еретиков и не важны — я должен знать, почему машина была для них так ценна!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"
languages.original_text: "Нам нужно знать, где находится этот когитатор! Пускай разговоры еретиков и не важны — я должен знать, почему машина была для них так ценна!"

traits.locale_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “可我们需要知道那台沉思者在什么地方！就算那些异端分子没说过什么重要的事情，我也必须弄清楚他们为什么会那么看重那台机器！”
languages.original_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"

traits.locale_text: “可我们需要知道那台思考器在什么地方！就算那些异端分子没说过什么重要的事情，我也必须弄清楚他们为什么会那么看重那台机器！”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡Necesitamos saber dónde está el cogitador! Por irrelevantes que sean las conversaciones de los herejes, ¡tengo que saber por qué es tan importante esa máquina para ellos!».
languages.original_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Necesitamos saber dónde está el cogitador! Por irrelevantes que sean las conversaciones de los herejes, ¡tengo que saber por qué es tan importante esa máquina para ellos!».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「考算機がどこにあるのかを突き止めねば！異端者どもの会話はどうでもいいとしても、あの機械がなぜ連中にとって貴重なものだったのかを知る必要があります！」
languages.original_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"

traits.locale_text: 「考算機がどこにあるのかを突き止めねば！異端者どもの会話はどうでもいいとしても、あの機械がなぜ連中にとって貴重なものだったのかを知る必要があります！」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wir müssen wissen, wo der Cogitator ist. Selbst wenn die Gespräche der Ketzer unwichtig sind, muss ich wissen, warum die Maschine so wertvoll für sie war!"
languages.original_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen wissen, wo der Cogitator ist. Selbst wenn die Gespräche der Ketzer unwichtig sind, muss ich wissen, warum die Maschine so wertvoll für sie war!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Nous devons découvrir où se trouve le cogitateur ! Même si les conversations des hérétiques ne sont pas importantes, elles pourraient nous aider à comprendre pourquoi ils accordaient une telle valeur à cette machine ! »
languages.original_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons découvrir où se trouve le cogitateur ! Même si les conversations des hérétiques ne sont pas importantes, elles pourraient nous aider à comprendre pourquoi ils accordaient une telle valeur à cette machine ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kavramsayarın nerede olduğunu öğrenmemiz gerek! Kâfirlerin konuşmaları önemsiz olsa da makinenin onlar için neden bu denli önemli olduğunu bilmeliyim!"
languages.original_text: "We need to know where the cogitator is! Even if the heretics' conversations are unimportant, I must know why the machine was so valuable to them!"

traits.locale_text: "Kavramsayarın nerede olduğunu öğrenmemiz gerek! Kâfirlerin konuşmaları önemsiz olsa da makinenin onlar için neden bu denli önemli olduğunu bilmeliyim!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
